name: Nathan Kamenar
summary: Strategic Senior Full Stack Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing, building, and operating end-to-end web applications, owning both backend services and frontend user interfaces in production environments. Strong backend focus on Golang, delivering high-performance microservices, REST and gRPC APIs, and event-driven systems, while working in polyglot stacks that include Java, Node.js (basic), and Python for AI-enabled services. Hands-on experience developing modern frontend applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, as well as Go templating frameworks (Gin templates, Fiber) for server-side rendering. Proven expertise in unit, integration, and contract testing in Go, cloud-native deployments on AWS, CI/CD automation, and distributed system design, with a strong track record of mentoring engineers and delivering scalable, maintainable full stack solutions.

Cloud & DevOps: AWS (ECS, EKS, Lambda, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, CloudFormation)
Testing & Automation: Go testing (unit, integration, contract tests using testing and testify)

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Designed and developed end-to-end full stack applications, owning both backend services and frontend user interfaces across multiple production systems.

Built high-performance backend services primarily using Go (Golang), developing scalable microservices with Gin, Echo, Fiber, and net/http, optimized for concurrency, low latency, and fault tolerance.
Implemented REST and gRPC APIs in Go, handling authentication, authorization, data validation, and business logic consumed directly by frontend applications.
Developed server-side rendered UIs in Go using Gin templates and Fiber, complementing React/Next.js frontends where appropriate.

Built and maintained frontend applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, creating reusable UI components, managing application state, and integrating real-time data via REST APIs and WebSockets.
Used Java (Spring Boot) alongside Go in a polyglot backend environment, supporting shared domains, messaging pipelines, and gradual service evolution.
Applied Node.js (basic) for lightweight backend-for-frontend (BFF) services and API gateways, simplifying frontend data access and request orchestration.
Built AI-enabled services using Python (FastAPI) to expose machine learning models for analytics and anomaly detection, integrating them into Go-based backend workflows.
Designed and implemented event-driven architectures using Kafka, RabbitMQ, and AWS SQS, with Go producers and consumers handling asynchronous processing and system decoupling.
Implemented comprehensive Go testing practices, including unit, integration, and contract tests with testing and testify, ensuring robust and maintainable backend services.
Deployed and operated full stack applications on AWS using ECS, EKS, Lambda, S3, RDS, and DynamoDB, ensuring scalability, security, and high availability.
Containerized applications with Docker and deployed via Kubernetes, managing rolling deployments, health checks, autoscaling, and graceful shutdowns.
Established CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Jenkins, automating builds, tests, and deployments for Go, Java, Node.js, and frontend applications.
Implemented monitoring and observability using Prometheus, Grafana, and structured logging, enabling proactive alerting and faster production issue resolution.
Led architectural decisions, conducted code reviews, and mentored engineers across both backend and frontend, maintaining consistent engineering standards and long-term maintainability.

experience.title: SharePoint Engineer
bullets: Designed and customized SharePoint 2013 and SharePoint Online sites for document management, team collaboration, and workflow automation.
Built custom workflows using SharePoint Designer and Power Automate, reducing manual approval and reporting effort.
Extended SharePoint functionality using JavaScript, REST APIs, and SPFx-style custom components.
Managed permissions, content types, and site structures to support secure and scalable enterprise usage.

experience.title: SharePoint Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained SharePoint 2010/2013 sites for internal collaboration, knowledge management, and reporting.
Customized SharePoint UI using master pages, JavaScript, jQuery, and CSS to align with business branding and usability requirements.
Implemented automated workflows for document approvals and notifications using SharePoint Designer.
Supported SharePoint integrations and data migrations while assisting with performance tuning and issue resolution.
